name: Who Needs Legs When You've Got Guns?
name_original: Who Needs Legs When You've Got Guns?
description:
FPS and platformer without direct movement—movement comes from your weapons.

Made for the 2018 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was "Genre, but you can't mechanic." In other words, make a game that fits a certain genre but is missing one of the main actions of that genre.

Theme

  • First-person and platforming genres without being able to directly control movement—movement comes from weapons
  • Also, an FPS with no enemies
  • Further breaks FPS expectations by moving your fingers from the WASD keys to the 1234 keys

Controls

  • Mouse to look
  • Left click to fire
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 to switch weapon
  • R to restart if you FAIL

Goal

  • Get good
  • Destroy as many target drones as you can

Credits

  • Hunter Angelovic - Programming / Level Design
  • Devon Stern - Programming
  • Joseph Burgan - 3D Assets / Music
